Text:
Nope you should use [AsyncTask][1].
Google introduced AsynchTask to clear the NRA problem.
Though your method works, but your application will lag if your network request take some time.
This kind of implementation is not acceptable anymore. And example [here][2]. [1]: http://developer.android.com/reference/android/os/AsyncTask.html [2]: http://www.compiletimeerror.com/2013/01/why-and-how-to-use-asynctask.html#.U0c9P_k72So
